com.ekkongames.elib.gui

Class UIPasswordBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ekkongames.elib.gui.UIElement
      • com.ekkongames.elib.gui.UITextBox
        • com.ekkongames.elib.gui.UIPasswordBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants

    public class UIPasswordBox
extends UITextBox
    A UIPasswordBox is similar to a UITextBox, except that all input is hidden from the user.
